alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Neshoba; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 9:27PM CST until January 03 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 927 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomastown, or 7 miles west of Carthage, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Thomastown around 930 PM CST. Carthage around 935 PM CST. Singleton around 945 PM CST. Renfroe around 950 PM CST. Edinburg around 955 PM CST. Zama around 1000 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
